alert.note: Alert for South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued October 10 at 2:16PM PDT until October 11 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 22 to 25 ft. * WHERE...South central Oregon Coast for the beaches from Port Orford northward. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Large breaking waves will create hazardous conditions along and within the surf zone, and could inundate beaches and low lying shorelines. Beach erosion is possible, and exposed infrastructure may be damaged. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Stay away from the surf zone and off of jetties. Area beaches may become hazardous due to dangerous surf conditions.
